text: Tried the chicken tacos here, and they were absolutely delicious! 🌮🔥The place has a great environment, especially at night—perfect for chilling and enjoying good food. The chef was super friendly, making the experience even better. Highly recommended! 👍 The customer service was excellent, very welcoming and attentive. Will definitely come back again! 😍👏

My 2nd time here, and will definitely come back here always for drinks. My favourite bar in puteri harbour/iskandar puteri. Very friendly and kind owner. Ps: they play a lot of spanish songs here which i love a lot!! Very romantic view too, perfect for a date night ❤️

I like the atmosphere. The live band is one of the added point. Lamb curry pizza is quite special and tasty. Foods all are nice. The only thing to be improve is variety of beer like Guinness Stout. Customer service is good, they can help to order kid’s meal from next bar. Definitely will go again.
Had one of the best Mac and Cheese. Good ambience and great food

Had dinner at 27@Cove and really enjoyed most of their food. My personal fav is their Baked Mac&Cheese, Fried Chicken and Iced Passion Fruit Tea.

You’ll definitely enjoy if you want a place to chill since they also have billiards. Restaurant is under new ownership, he’s very nice and attentive to customer’s needs. Highly recommended bar and restaurant!😊
